creator: weareblox
descriptionHtml:
Investing in cryptocurrencies within 60 seconds? Yes you can!

Bitcoin beginner, advanced trader or ultimate HODLER? From now on, all you’ll ever need is your smartphone. BLOX is the all-in-one platform where you can trade in cryptocurrencies, coins and tokens.

BLOX puts you first! We make investing in bitcoin as easy as can be. Start investing with an amount that suits you. Whether you opt for bitcoin or one of our other coins, would like to start with 10 or 10,000 euros, we’ve got your back. Access your coins from all over the world and manage your assets with just one click.

Create your BLOX account in just 60 seconds:

1. Download
2. Register
3. Fund
4. Invest

Welcome. Everybody.

title: BLOX crypto trading - buy bitcoin without wallet

creator: weareblox
descriptionHtml:
BLOX makes crypto trading easy

Discover BLOX! Investing in cryptocurrency without a wallet. Crypto trading has never been this easy. All you need is your phone 📱

BLOX =
✅ Child's play. No more hassle since you won’t have to create a wallet or download a price tracker app anymore.
✅ Lightning fast. Buy bitcoin in just four seconds. Trading in the blink of an eye! Respond directly to the crypto price without the need for a wallet.
✅ From 1 euro! Whether you’re investing a tenner or a ton, we got you covered.
✅ Carefree and safe. Lost your phone? No worries, withdrawing is only possible to a connected bank account on your name.
✅ All in one. Buying bitcoin, crypto trading, and keeping an eye on the price. BLOX will be the only app you’ll need.
✅ Wide range. Invest in Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), VeChain (VET), Litecoin (LTC), Dogecoin (DOGE), Tron (TRX), Binance Coin (BNB), Stellar (XLM), Basic Attention Token (BAT), Tezos (XTZ), EOS (EOS), Zcash (ZEC), Dash (DASH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Monero (XMR), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Lisk (LSK), Qtum (QTUM), Cosmos (ATOM), Algorand (ALGO), Nano (NANO), and OMG Network (OMG).

Invest in cryptocurrency in just 60 seconds:
1. Download. Tip: goes even faster with your WiFi.
2. Register. Create a FREE account in a matter of seconds.
3. Deposit. Top up your credit using your credit card or a bank transfer.
4. Invest. Your bitcoin and cryptocurrency trading adventure can begin! Check the exchange rate and buy your favourite currency. Investing has never been this easy, a bitcoin wallet is not necessary.

Download the BLOX app and start trading cryptocurrencies without a wallet!

👵 For everyone
BLOX is investing in bitcoin or crypto, without the need for a wallet and other difficult things! With BLOX you won't need any technical knowledge. Even our parents are now able to trade whenever they want. Check the price, buy your favourite cryptocurrency, and sell if you make a profit. That's investing with BLOX!

🙏 We’re happy to help
Yeah, I'm sure you’ve heard that cliché before! But we’ll take the time to answer all of your questions about the price, bitcoin, and cryptocurrencies. This way you can invest in your favourite crypto carefree. No wallet needed, so you will always be on the right track.

🤯All-in-one app
A separate app to check the bitcoin price, a wallet app to manage your coins, and another one to buy cryptocurrencies? Why overcomplicate? With BLOX you have everything in one, so you can invest in cryptocurrency anytime, anywhere.

⚡ Lightning fast investing
Download the BLOX app and always have the crypto price at hand. Check the price of bitcoin or another crypto and choose your perfect trading moment. Selling cryptocurrencies is just as easy. Deposit your profit directly into your bank account!

🤩Wide range
We like a wide range of options, what about you? With 15+ different coins, there’s always a coin that spikes your interest. We regularly add new cryptocurrencies to the app; an extra reason to check your phone regularly (in addition to checking the price 😉 ).

👛Every wallet
BLOX is cryptocurrency trading for everyone, without needing a bitcoin or cryptocurrency wallet. Buy your favourite crypto from as little as 1 euro and always stay informed of the price. Or buy right away for a thousand euros - you're the boss. Investing is choosing your price with BLOX!

👍Trading without worries
A bitcoin or crypto wallet can be hacked, but with BLOX you don't have to worry. Does anyone have your password for the app? Then he or she can only transfer money to your personal bank account. Worry-free crypto trading!

🎉Congratulations
You have read the text in its entirety. Haven't downloaded the app yet? Download BLOX and join thousands of other investors who trade cryptocurrencies without needing a bitcoin or crypto wallet.

Happy trading 😎
descriptionShort: Quick and safe trading in bitcoin, ether and cryptocurrency

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: A brand new look. Familiar as ever. Welcome to the new BLOX app!

title: BLOX crypto trading - buy bitcoin without wallet

creator: weareblox
descriptionHtml:
BLOX makes crypto trading easy

Discover BLOX! Investing in cryptocurrency without a wallet. Crypto trading has never been this easy. All you need is your phone 📱

BLOX =
✅ Child's play. No more hassle since you won’t have to create a wallet or download a price tracker app anymore.
✅ Lightning fast. Buy bitcoin in just 4 seconds. Trading in the blink of an eye! Respond directly to the crypto price without the need for a wallet.
✅ From 1 euro! Whether you’re investing a tenner or a ton, we got you covered.
✅ Carefree and safe. Lost your phone? No worries, withdrawing is only possible to a connected bank account on your name.
✅ All in one. Buying bitcoin, crypto trading, and keeping an eye on the price. BLOX will be the only app you’ll need.
✅ Wide range. Invest in Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), VeChain (VET), Litecoin (LTC), Dogecoin (DOGE), Tron (TRX), Binance Coin (BNB), Stellar (XLM), Basic Attention Token (BAT), Tezos (XTZ), EOS (EOS), Zcash (ZEC), Dash (DASH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Monero (XMR), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Lisk (LSK), Qtum (QTUM), Cosmos (ATOM), Algorand (ALGO), Nano (NANO), and OMG Network (OMG).

Invest in cryptocurrency in just 60 seconds:
1. Download. Tip: goes even faster with your Wi-Fi.
2. Register. Create a FREE account in a matter of seconds.
3. Deposit. Top up your credit using your credit card or a bank transfer.
4. Invest. Your bitcoin and cryptocurrency trading adventure can begin! Check the exchange rate and buy your favourite currency. Investing has never been this easy, a bitcoin wallet is not necessary.

Download the BLOX app and start trading cryptocurrencies without a wallet!

👵 For everyone
BLOX is investing in bitcoin or crypto, without the need for a wallet and other difficult things! With BLOX you won't need any technical knowledge. Even our parents are now able to trade whenever they want. Check the price, buy your favourite cryptocurrency, and sell if you make a profit. That's investing with BLOX!

🙏 We’re happy to help
Yeah, I'm sure you’ve heard that cliché before! But we’ll take the time to answer all of your questions about the price, bitcoin, and cryptocurrencies. This way you can invest in your favourite crypto carefree. No wallet needed, so you will always be on the right track.

🤯 All-in-one app
A separate app to check the bitcoin price, a wallet app to manage your coins, and another one to buy cryptocurrencies? Why overcomplicate? With BLOX you have everything in one, so you can invest in cryptocurrency anytime, anywhere.

⚡ Lightning fast investing
Download the BLOX app and always have the crypto price at hand. Check the price of bitcoin or another crypto and choose your perfect trading moment. Selling cryptocurrencies is just as easy. Deposit your profit directly into your bank account!

🤩 Wide range
We like a wide range of options, what about you? With 25+ different coins, there’s always a coin that spikes your interest. We regularly add new cryptocurrencies to the app; an extra reason to check your phone regularly (in addition to checking the price 😉 ).

👛 Every wallet
BLOX is cryptocurrency trading for everyone, without needing a bitcoin or cryptocurrency wallet. Buy your favourite crypto from as little as 1 euro and always stay informed of the price. Or buy right away for a 1,000 euros - you're the boss. Investing is choosing your price with BLOX!

👍 Trading without worries
A bitcoin or crypto wallet can be hacked, but with BLOX you don't have to worry. Does anyone have your password for the app? Then he or she can only transfer money to your personal bank account. Worry-free crypto trading!

🎉 Congratulations
You've read the text in its entirety. Haven't downloaded the app yet? Download BLOX and join thousands of other investors who trade cryptocurrencies without needing a bitcoin or crypto wallet.

Happy trading 😎

Discover BLOX! Investing in cryptocurrency without a wallet. Crypto trading has never been this easy. All you need is your phone 📱

BLOX =
✅ Child's play. No more hassle since you won’t have to create a wallet or download a price tracker app anymore.
✅ Lightning fast. Buy bitcoin in just 4 seconds. Trading in the blink of an eye! Respond directly to the crypto price without the need for a wallet.
✅ From 1 euro! Whether you’re investing a tenner or a ton, we got you covered.
✅ Carefree and safe. Lost your phone? No worries, withdrawing is only possible to a connected bank account on your name.
✅ All in one. Buying bitcoin, crypto trading, and keeping an eye on the price. BLOX will be the only app you’ll need.
✅ Wide range. Invest in Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), VeChain (VET), Litecoin (LTC), Dogecoin (DOGE), Tron (TRX), Binance Coin (BNB), Stellar (XLM), Basic Attention Token (BAT), Tezos (XTZ), EOS (EOS), Zcash (ZEC), Dash (DASH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Monero (XMR), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Lisk (LSK), Qtum (QTUM), Cosmos (ATOM), Algorand (ALGO), Nano (NANO), and OMG Network (OMG).

Invest in cryptocurrency in just 60 seconds:
1. Download. Tip: goes even faster with your Wi-Fi.
2. Register. Create a FREE account in a matter of seconds.
3. Deposit. Top up your credit using your credit card or a bank transfer.
4. Invest. Your bitcoin and cryptocurrency trading adventure can begin! Check the exchange rate and buy your favourite currency. Investing has never been this easy, a bitcoin wallet is not necessary.

Download the BLOX app and start trading cryptocurrencies without a wallet!

👵 For everyone
BLOX is investing in bitcoin or crypto, without the need for a wallet and other difficult things! With BLOX you won't need any technical knowledge. Even our parents are now able to trade whenever they want. Check the price, buy your favourite cryptocurrency, and sell if you make a profit. That's investing with BLOX!

🙏 We’re happy to help
Yeah, I'm sure you’ve heard that cliché before! But we’ll take the time to answer all of your questions about the price, bitcoin, and cryptocurrencies. This way you can invest in your favourite crypto carefree. No wallet needed, so you will always be on the right track.

🤯 All-in-one app
A separate app to check the bitcoin price, a wallet app to manage your coins, and another one to buy cryptocurrencies? Why overcomplicate? With BLOX you have everything in one, so you can invest in cryptocurrency anytime, anywhere.

⚡ Lightning fast investing
Download the BLOX app and always have the crypto price at hand. Check the price of bitcoin or another crypto and choose your perfect trading moment. Selling cryptocurrencies is just as easy. Deposit your profit directly into your bank account!

🤩 Wide range
We like a wide range of options, what about you? With 25+ different coins, there’s always a coin that spikes your interest. We regularly add new cryptocurrencies to the app; an extra reason to check your phone regularly (in addition to checking the price 😉 ).

👛 Every wallet
BLOX is cryptocurrency trading for everyone, without needing a bitcoin or cryptocurrency wallet. Buy your favourite crypto from as little as 1 euro and always stay informed of the price. Or buy right away for a 1,000 euros - you're the boss. Investing is choosing your price with BLOX!

👍 Trading without worries
A bitcoin or crypto wallet can be hacked, but with BLOX you don't have to worry. Does anyone have your password for the app? Then he or she can only transfer money to your personal bank account. Worry-free crypto trading!

🎉 Congratulations
You've read the text in its entirety. Haven't downloaded the app yet? Download BLOX and join thousands of other investors who trade cryptocurrencies without needing a bitcoin or crypto wallet.

Happy trading 😎
